New Records: Otto López was a triple shy of a cycle; Connor Norby homered and drove in three runs; Miami Marlins snapped Philadelphia Phillies' six-game winning streak
Key Match Events: Connor Norby homered in the first inning; Otto López homered in the seventh inning; Miami Marlins scored four runs in the seventh inning to turn the deficit; Philadelphia Phillies scored two runs in the ninth inning but couldn't overcome the deficit
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the fourth of a series, with the Marlins trailing 2-2
